ChangeToken.description: The value returned by the most recent call to GetChangeToken.

DefaultAction.description: A default action for the web ACL, either ALLOW or BLOCK. AWS WAF performs the default action if a request doesn't match the criteria in any of the rules in a web ACL.

Updates.description: An array of updates to make to the WebACL. An array of WebACLUpdate objects that you want to insert into or delete from a WebACL. For more information, see the applicable data types:    WebACLUpdate: Contains Action and ActivatedRule     ActivatedRule: Contains Action, Priority, and RuleId     WafAction: Contains Type

WebACLId.description: The WebACLId of the WebACL that you want to update. WebACLId is returned by CreateWebACL and by ListWebACLs.
